ID.description: The Package ID to Search for

$ul: **Autorun**: Value is true if package should run automatically. Default value is false.
**CRC**: The CRC used to validate the download.
**LocalizedName**: Optional. The StringID used to localize the name of the Package
**PackageTypeID**: The id of the package type this package belongs to.
**PreviousVersion**: For delta packages, the previous version required.  For non-delta packages, the Previous version is 0.  Default value is 0.
**ReleaseDate**: The date the package was released
**Released**: True if the package is released.  Default value is False.
**RemoveOnSuccess**: True to remove the package after successful execution.  Default value is False.
**Size**: The size of the file at the specified URL.  If a size is not supplied at creation time, the size will be determined by the response from the URL.
**Switches**: The command line arguments for the package.  Default value is an empty string.
**Url**: The Url to download the package from.
